snippet: The online grocer, has been based in Queens, where it received a tax break from the city, for the past decade. In recent months, the company had played New Jersey against New York in its search for a new headquarters and truck depot.
abstract: The online grocer, has been based in Queens, where it received a tax break from the city, for the past decade. In recent months, the company had played New Jersey against New York in its search for a new headquarters and truck depot.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and CHARLES V. BAGLI

headline.main: New York Wins the Battle for Fresh Direct
headline.print_headline: With Tax Deal, City Will Keep FreshDirect
